name: Uncertainty
description:
Instructions:

You can only hit enemies with same color as you but enemies don't see color, they hit you no matter what you look like.

Hold LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to attack

Press RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to change color

Press SPACE to change weapons

Move with WASD or ARROW KEYS

Made in 30 hours using Kenny's Bit Pack for Miz Jam

Source: https://github.com/AshkmanZ/UNcertainty
